content.title: Innovations for Defence Excellence
content.beneficiary: Startups and individual innovators in Defence and Aerospace sector
content.details: Innovations for Defence Excellence (iDEX) is the operational framework of the Defence Innovation Organization (DIO), launched in 2018 to support innovation for Indian Defence and create pathways for adoption of technologies in the Indian armed services.
benefits: Funding up to Rs 1.5 crore for prototype development
Support in technology and business development
eligibility: Indian companies incorporated under the Companies Act 1956/2013
Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) as defined in the MSME Act, 2006
content.application_process: Applicants must apply for challenges launched under the Defence India Startup Challenge (DISC) and fill in the application over the specified link.
documents_required: Bank account statements for iDEX project
Proposal details including technical and financial details

faqs.question: What is the purpose of IDeX, DIO?
faqs.answer: To make the country self-reliant in Defence through innovation and technology development.

faqs.question: What are the objectives of iDEX?
faqs.answer: To create corporate Venture Capital models for Defence needs and transform defence innovation in India.

faqs.question: How does iDEX select startups to support?
faqs.answer: Through open and transparent processes under various programs including DISC.
